events.description: Sean “Diddy” Combs was acquitted of racketeering and sex trafficking charges but found guilty on two lesser counts.

events.eventName: Nathan’s Famous Hot Dog Eating Contest
events.description: Joey Chestnut and Miki Sudo won their respective divisions in this iconic Fourth of July event.

events.eventName: Gunman Shooting at Midtown Office Building
events.description: A shooting left five people dead, including an NYPD officer, and the gunman died by suicide.

events.eventName: Summer Streets Expanded for NYC 400th Anniversary
events.description: Expanded to cover more than 400 blocks, offering car-free zones for walking, biking, and entertainment.

events.eventName: Jazz Age Lawn Party on Governors Island
events.description: Celebrated its 20th anniversary with live jazz, dance lessons, vintage cars, and thousands in period attire.

events.eventName: Z100 Summer Bash at Hudson Yards
events.description: Featured top artists like Lewis Capaldi and Julia Michaels in a major summer music highlight.

Outbreak traced to cooling towers sickened 114 people and killed seven, leading to reforms.

events.eventName: Façade Collapse and Evacuation in West Village
events.description: A brick façade collapse prompted an emergency evacuation and legal disputes over safety.
